The official Yoyo Shortcut Extension. Quickly save and organize bookmarks, use keywords to navigate to websites, and more with Yoyo Shortcut.
For people who work with many projects, Yoyo Shortcut is a simple bookmark manager that organizes all your important bookmarks in one place and allows you to create memorable keywords for any bookmarks for quicker access. 
______________________________________________
Key Features of the Yoyo Shortcut extension: 
- While browsing your favorite website, simply press [Option / Alt] + [Shift] + [S] to instantly bookmark the current webpage.
- Organize your bookmark on the go with our intuitive UI
- Use bookmark keywords directly on your browser address bar. Just type "yo" then [space / tab] then [keyword].
- Chain your keywords to distinguish bookmarks in different scopes. E.g: projectA design, projectB timeline, etc.
- Lookup for shortcuts by using [Option / Alt] + [Shift] + [F]
- Open Yoyo Shortcut dashboard to view your links in a new tab
______________________________________________
About Yoyo Shortcut: 
Unlike traditional bookmarking tool, Yoyo Shortcut reduces friction in your workflow and saves you time finding bookmarks by empower you to use keywords to navigate to websites in your favorite browser and providing you a beautiful dashboard for your bookmarks that can be organized the way you want.
______________________________________________
For more information, visit: https://www.yoyoshortcut.com/
